text: Hotel Pacific () is a 1975 Polish Czech drama movie directed by Janusz Majewski and starring Marek Kondrat, Roman Wilhelmi, Roman Skamene, Čestmír Řanda, Michał Pawlicki, Stanisława Celińska, Joanna Kasperska, Jaroslava Schallerová. ==Other websites== * Category:1975 drama movies Category:Polish drama movies Category:Czech drama movies Category:Movies directed by Janusz Majewski Category:Movies set in the 1930s Category:Movies set in hotels
title: Hotel Pacific
